parameters.name: identifier
parameters.description: The identifier of the specified Amazon DataZone domain.

nested_items.name: arn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the specified Amazon DataZone domain.

nested_items.name: createdAt
nested_items.description: The timestamp of when the Amazon DataZone domain was created.

nested_items.name: description
nested_items.description: The description of the Amazon DataZone domain.

nested_items.name: domainExecutionRole
nested_items.description: The domain execution role with which the Amazon DataZone domain is created.

nested_items.name: id
nested_items.description: The identifier of the specified Amazon DataZone domain.

nested_items.name: kmsKeyIdentifier
nested_items.description: The identifier of the Amazon Web Services Key Management Service (KMS) key that is used to encrypt the Amazon DataZone domain, metadata, and reporting data.

nested_items.name: lastUpdatedAt
nested_items.description: The timestamp of when the Amazon DataZone domain was last updated.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The name of the Amazon DataZone domain.

nested_items.name: portalUrl
nested_items.description: The URL of the data portal for this Amazon DataZone domain.

nested_items.name: rootDomainUnitId
nested_items.description: The ID of the root domain in Amazon Datazone.

nested_items.name: serviceRole
nested_items.description: The service role of the domain.

nested_items.name: singleSignOn
nested_items.description: The single sing-on option of the specified Amazon DataZone domain.

nested_items.name: idcInstanceArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the IDC instance.

nested_items.name: type
nested_items.description: The type of single sign-on in Amazon DataZone.

nested_items.name: userAssignment
nested_items.description: The single sign-on user assignment in Amazon DataZone.

nested_items.name: status
nested_items.description: The status of the specified Amazon DataZone domain.
